request.description:
- **Description**: Retrieve a list of all users.
    

### Response Body

The response is a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "ok": "boolean",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "number",
            "email": "string",
            "role": "string",
            "name": "string",
            "lName": "string",
            "phone": "string"
        },{
            "id": "number",
            "email": "string",
            "role": "string",
            "name": "string",
            "lName": "string",
            "phone": "string"
        },{
            "id": "number",
            "email": "string",
            "role": "string",
            "name": "string",
            "lName": "string",
            "phone": "string"
        },....
    ],
    "msg": "string"
}

 ```
